snippet: The Democratic candidate William C. Thompson Jr. made a return visit to the Lincoln Houses, a public housing complex in Harlem.
abstract: Trailside blog; New York City mayoral candidate William C Thompson Jr returns to Lincoln Houses, public housing complex in Harlem that he visited in July with Rev Al Sharpton, to check on residents and dine with them; Thompson and others had expressed shock at condition of complex during earlier visit.
lead_paragraph: The Democratic candidate William C. Thompson Jr. made a return visit to the Lincoln Houses, a public housing complex in Harlem.

headline.main: Back for Dinner at Housing Project
headline.print_headline:
Back for Dinner
At Housing Project
